attributes.action: change the logo for the 2012 London Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The newly unveiled logo for the London 2012 Olympics does not reflect the sprit of london and its people or represent the the best of British design. We the undersigned ask the Prime Minster to use his influence with the London Olympic Committee to have them commission a new logo for the 2012 Olympics of which the people of London and the UK can be proud.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
